Articles.Content:
Hello, I tried to open the cheat menu with alt + F2

but this happens:

http://zapodaj.net/7d4cfdb8b8446.png.html

How do I open cheat menu?

(Playing on Windows 7)
Hi, alt+F2 opens the debug log, alt+F12 opens the debug or "cheat" menu

Whoa!  I totally did not know about alt-F2 doing this!

For all my mods, when I've needed to look at debug logs a lot, I've been doing Alt-F12 and then clicking the button to switch to the debug log therein.  Literally hundreds of times.  And every single time, grumbling to myself "...gosh darn debug log, hafta do all these mouse clicks every single time, why can't they just have a single-keypress way to show the log, grrr..."

Thank you!  I know it was an accidental discovery on your part and wasn't what you were trying to do, and I'm glad that sal_vager has pointed you in the right direction.  But you've just taught me something useful that I did not know, even if it was an accident.
